name: Disappear [Extreme Opsec]
description:
In a world saturated with location-monitoring cameras and surveillance devices in every home and on every street, you must take extreme operational security measures. Secure your communications, avoid detection and hack your social score to protect yourself from agents of nation states with near unlimited funds.

Disappear and start again.

This interactive fiction was initiated after taking part in RAID, a project to design a logo and concept for a non-existent video game. It was created using Bitsy, a tool by Adam Le Doux. Soundtrack is Rubicon by Clu.

Disappear is made by Pavilion.

Donations are welcome via Bitcoin to the following address: 3Mxzx39B69dyEbjKy264PWydWAmrraR8Hz
